name: Prince Arthur
description: Traditional pub with polished wood, leather banquettes, real ales and taxidermy heads.
address: 95 Forest Rd, London Fields, London E8 3BH

name: Stokey Bears
description: Rustic hangout turning out burgers with creative toppings, plus craft beers and cocktails.
address: 129 Stoke Newington High St, London N16 0PH

name: The Bonneville tavern
description: Low-lit brasserie with stripped walls and banquettes, for French-inspired menu and cocktails.

name: The Old Fountain
description: Freehouse with a rotating selection of cask ales, a classic pub food menu and its own roof terrace.

name: The Beer Shop London
description: The Beer Shop London is a small, friendly micro pub in Nunhead, South East London.

name: Two Floors
description: Casual bar with stools at a long wooden counter, above colourful tiki-style basement cocktail den.

name: Electricity Showrooms
description: Laid-back update on a Victorian pub (with cocktail menu), plus DJs and dance floor in the basement.

name: The Bull Highgate
description: Smart, trendy pub with bay windows, British menu and a selection of beers brewed on the premises.

name: The Cavendish
description: Light-filled, corner restaurant serving European cuisine and cocktails in a dining room with booths.

name: Drafthouse Old Street
description: The Draft House is a small group of Public Houses which aims to do for beer what our culture has done for food and wine over the past twenty years.
address: Mews Unit, The Bower,, 211 Old St, London EC1V 9NR

name: Hash E8
description: hash is a restaurant and brunch bar specialising in british and american breakfast and lunch classics

name: The Market Cafe
description: Laid-back old-pub setting with stripped floors and mismatched furniture for Italian comfort food.

name: Dr Inks Waterloo
description: Relaxed, spacious bar serving British food, wraps and burgers, plus a cocktail menu.

name: The London Beer House
description: THE LONDON BEER HOUSE IS A CRAFT BEER SHOP AND PUB, LOCATED A ‘HOPS’ THROW FROM PICCADILLY IN ST JAMES

name: The manor House pub
description: The Manor House has an excellent reputation for classic British dishes. Good Pub food the way it should be!

name: The Rose and Crown
description: Large pub with a multitude of small window panes inside and out and a popular, decked roof terrace.

name: The White Horse
description: Victorian gastropub with garden, mahogany interior and flagstones, plus numerous worldwide beers.

name: The Exmouth Arms
description: Victorian pub with a green-tiled facade, stained-glass windows and a large menu of bottled beers.

name: The Mall Tavern
description: A wonderful London Pub, serving great British food all day, everyday.

name: The Crown and Anchor
description: Welcome to the Crown & Anchor. Your local, and sister pub of the Jolly Butchers in Stoke Newington, winner of Time Out's best new beer bar in 2012

name: Watsons General
description: Spacious beer-centric pub with an ever-changing selection and fire pits in the large rear garden.

name: Proud Camden
description: Relaxed daytime bar in former horse hospital transforms into a burlesque venue and club after dark.

name: Shoreditch House
description: Shoreditch House is a members' club with bedrooms in a converted East London warehouse.

name: Costcutter London Fields
description: London fields newsagent - the first bottle account for FRB and our local shop

name: Junction Offlicense
description: Off licencse next to Dalston Junction
